@hannahb_crafts thank you for purchasing my pattern please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or are confused about any of the instructions this is an original design by hannah bickerstaff the pattern is for personal use only the pattern in whole or in part may not be reproduced distributed resold translated published altered shared or posted over the internet or offline you can sell your finished products made from this pattern providing they are made by yourself not mass produced info and please credit me as the designer size may vary but if you have similar gauge to me the orangutan will be about 25cm tall this pattern uses u s crochet terms e g double_crochet/double_crochet in u k = single crochet/single_crochet in u s when working in spirals from a magic ring use the invisible decrease for a skills required smoother looking finished item basic amigurumi - magic_ring single the only time i recommend using a crochet chain and single_crochet on both sides of a regular decrease is with the palms chain increase decrease invisible which are flat pieces decrease double_crochet and half double crochet french knot surface crochet video link included on page 20 © 2021 hb crafts all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only 3 hannah bickerstaff - @hannahb_crafts materials yarn - use any yarn of your preference here is what i used 1 ball of cotton kings 8/4 in dark grey less than 1 ball of cotton kings 8/4 in beige 1 and a half balls of king cole eyelash yarn in ginger black yarn for the face details crochet hooks 2mm 2 5mm and 3mm other 12mm safety eyes stuffing garden wire* pliers* tapestry needle stitch marker pins small magnets* *optional depending on if you want to add posable arms and magnetic hands an d feet abbreviations u s terms chain…………………………………………………………………………………………………………………chain magic_ring…………………………………………………………………………………………………………magic_ring single_crochet…………………………………………………………………………………………………… single_crochet double_crochet………………………………………………………………………………………………… double_crochet half_double_crochet……………………………………………………………………………………… half_double_crochet increase…………………………………………………………………………………………………………… increase decrease………………………………………………………………………………………………………… decrease st/sts……………………………………………………………………………………………… stitch/stitches slip_stitch………………………………………………………………………………………………………… slip_stitch … xn………………………………………………………… repeat instructions in brackets n times © 2021 hb crafts all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only 4 hannah bickerstaff - @hannahb_crafts head use 3mm hook and dark grey yarn round sts 1 single_crochet 6 in magic_ring 6 2 increase 6 12 single_crochet 6 in magic_ring 3 single_crochet 1 increase x6 18 4 single_crochet 2 increase x6 24 5
